fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer

Class DefaultMessagingConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer.MessagingConfigurerAdapter
      • fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer.DefaultMessagingConfigurer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurer<MessagingBuilder>, MessagingConfigurer

    @ConfigurerFor(targetedBuilder={"minimal","standard"},
               priority=100000)
public class DefaultMessagingConfigurer
extends MessagingConfigurerAdapter
    Default configurer that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard() or MessagingBuilder.minimal().

    The configurer has a priority of 100000 in order to be applied before all other configurers.

    This configurer applies general configuration (see EnvironmentBuilder):
    • The MessagingService will catch all uncaught exception (even runtime) in order to wrap them in a MessagingException.
    • General environment configuration:
      • System properties with
      • Uses the DefaultConverter
      • Environment will be inherited by sub-builders by default.
    • Resource resolution configuration (see ResourceResolutionBuilder):
      • Lookup prefixes for classpath: "classpath:" and no lookup prefix (if no prefix is defined, then classpath is used).
      • Lookup prefix for file: "file:".
      • Lookup prefixes for string: "string:", "s:.
      • Resource resolution will be by default inherited by sub-builders
    • Configure common email behaviors:
      • Configure resource resolution for attachments, css inlining and image inlining using same resource resolution configuration as the general one (see ResourceResolutionBuilder)
      • Configure mimetype detection for attachments and image inlining (see MimetypeDetectionBuilder)
      • Automatically fill Email messages with subject either from title tag of html template, from first line starting with "Subject:" of text template or using ogham.email.subject property if defined (see AutofillSubjectBuilder)
      • Autofill Email messages with sender address if one of the property ogham.email.from or mail.smtp.from is defined (see AutofillDefaultEmailAddressBuilder)
      • Autofill Email messages with recipient address (to) if the property ogham.email.to is defined (see AutofillDefaultEmailAddressBuilder)
      • Autofill Email messages with recipient address (cc) if the property ogham.email.cc is defined (see AutofillDefaultEmailAddressBuilder)
      • Autofill Email messages with recipient address (bcc) if the property ogham.email.bcc is defined (see AutofillDefaultEmailAddressBuilder)
      • Automatically inline CSS styles in the HTML templates (see CssInliningBuilder)
      • Automatically inline images in the email either by attaching them or by converting them into base64 (see ImageInliningBuilder)
    • Configure common SMS behaviors:
      • Autofill Sms messages with sender phone number if the property ogham.sms.from is defined (see AutofillSmsBuilder)
      • Autofill Sms messages with recipient phone number if the property ogham.sms.to is defined (see AutofillSmsBuilder)
      • Configure phone number formats (see SenderNumberFormatBuilder and RecipientNumberFormatBuilder)
    • Mimetype detection configuration:
      • Uses Tika to detect mimetype (see TikaBuilder)
      • Uses property ogham.mimetype.default-mimetype if Tika has not detected the mimetype (see MimetypeDetectionBuilder)
      • Uses application/octet-stream if neither Tika has detected mimetype nor default property value has been set
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
